headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LITTELL, ROSALIND "RONNIE." THE FAMILY OF RONNIE LITTELL DEEPLY MOURN HER DEATH ON JANUARY 10

keywords.value: LITTELL, ROSALIND "RONNIE." THE FAMILY OF RONNIE LITTELL DEEPLY MOURN HER DEATH ON JANUARY 10
keywords.name: persons

snippet: LITTELL--Rosalind "Ronnie." The family of Ronnie Littell deeply mourn her death on January 10, 2016 at age 91. Beloved wife of David; mother of Bruce (and Heather) and Scott (and Sherri); grandmother of Nicole (and Tom), Danielle, Brent, Griffin, Marissa and Erika; great-grand- mother to Emma and Jack. A prolific song writer and lover of music, Ronnie was a frequent guest on the Joe Franklin Show. The Ronnie Littell Special, a tribute to her father, is believed to be the longest running program on public television. Her memory will be a blessing for all she loved and all who loved her. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LITTELL--Rosalind "Ronnie." The family of Ronnie Littell deeply mourn her death on January 10, 2016 at age 91. Beloved wife of David; mother of Bruce (and Heather) and Scott (and Sherri); grandmother of Nicole (and Tom), Danielle, Brent, Griffin, Marissa and Erika; great-grand- mother to Emma and Jack. A prolific song writer and lover of music, Ronnie was a frequent guest on the Joe Franklin Show. The Ronnie Littell Special, a tribute to her father, is believed to be the longest running program on public television. Her memory will be a blessing for all she loved and all who loved her. 1/3
